Row.Text: My name is Tokisaki Kurumi. I am all but a spirit in these lands.
Come, come, let's get started. (You are invited to visit.)
You are so sweet.. a thousand times more sweet and delicious than cake. (Accepts your invitation.)
Let us exchange info on our capitals, I'd love to visit more. (Exchanging capitals' positions.)
Time is incredibly considerate, time is also incredibly cruel..
Since its you, I would.. love to.
I'm scary, aren't I?
I feel quite lonely..
No matter how many years of rain, we will not forget each other. No... no matter how many years of rain, you will not forget me?
A shame...
You were ready to kill another creature, yet you're scared to be killed. Don't you think that's weird? When you point a gun at another life... This is what happens.
Heheheh, there will certainly be a lot of death. (Declares war on you.)
Well, I don't have much of a choice. I guess I'll end this here..
Let's end it here..
They all look so delicious, I'm looking forward to it! (Accepts your delegation.) ~
That was for me? Not.. good enough..
What you are doing interests me so much.. don't look at me like that, let me join in too!
Ahhhh, it's so hard to resist.
It's fine.. no worries.
Time cannot run away from the chains of life's destiny!
Don't you think it's a strange mentality to want to kill a certain creature, but not be ready to be killed yourself?
Well then.. this time let me truly repay the favor. I owe you. (Embassy was accepted.)
I was a capricious child, too. (Embassy was rejected.)
So intriguing you are.. don't look at me like that, perhaps...
Welcome - I've been waiting for you.. for so.. so long time. (Acception of Embassay.)
That's sad. (Rejection of Embassay.)
People's hearts can change in ways that even they can't predict.

I can't wait to enjoy the taste of you~ (Have agreed to enter into an alliance.)
I am so alone.. so sad.. I am going to cry. (Refused to enter into an alliance.)
Come, fall in love with me ~ (Alliance negotiations begin)
I can't wait to enjoy the taste of you ~ (Agreed to create an alliance.)
This is not funny. This is displeasing. It is very...disgusting. (Refusing to enter into an alliance.)
Ahaha, you can stay longer if you wanted ~ (Agreed with the deal.)
My, my. Don't you think you're being extremely rude? (Refuse to trade.)
Very well then, I can't wait to for our next deal ~ (Accepted deal.)
My, my. Don't you think you're being extremely rude by interrupting my rendezvous with Shido-san? (Trade was rejected.)
Time is incredibly considerate, and time is incredibly cruel. (Tokisaki Kurumi is satisfied with the terms and conditions.)
This is not funny. This is displeasing. It is very...disgusting. (Tokisaki Kurumi denies the request.)
My everything is dedicated to you, aside from my spiritual life. (Tokisaki Kurumi accepted the request.)
Ahahaha, you are so good! ~ (Accepted the request.)
I'm quite adept with a gun, despite my appearance. (Rejected the request.)
Almost time to add 'time'... (Concluded a peace bargain.)
You still do not understand? People like you will NEVER defeat me! (Rejected peaceful negotiation.)
Honestly, I don’t really want to do this but...there is no other way. (Proposal peace bargaining.)
Almost time to add 'time'... (Concluded a peace bargain.)
For you, even falling into hell is not enough. (Rejected peaceful bargain.)
Come, come, please come in. ~ (Permission for open borders.)
I am not that kind you know. Anything further up here, will require another fee okay. (Rejection for open borders.)
Will you allow me just this much? (Request for open borders.)
Ahhh ~ I can't wait... for you.. (Allowed open borders for Tokisaki Kurumi.)
I'm scary, aren't I? (Denied open borders.)
The scary and terrible fire spirit is here again today, so I'll take my leave here. (She is settling to close.)
You are all but bait in my eyes.. (Continues to settle near your border.)
The scary and terrible fire spirit is here again today, so I'll take my leave here. (Promised to you not to take military action.)
You are all but bait in my eyes.. (Ignored the warning and sought the opportunity for military action.)
The scary and terrible fire spirit is here again today, so I'll take my leave here. (Poomised to you not to send spies.)
You are all but bait in my eyes... (Ignored the warning and continued her espionage activities.)
The scary and terrible fire spirit is here again today, so I'll take my leave here. (Promise not to steal the secret treasure.)
You are all but bait in my eyes... (Ignored the warning and continued stealing.)
The scary and terrible fire spirit is here again today, so I'll take my leave here. (Promised to you to stop missionary work.)
You are all but bait in my eyes... (Ignored the warning and continued missionary work.)
You are making me quite uncomfortable! You aren't allowed to settle that close to me.
Thank you, perhaps you stay with me a little longer? (Agreed to request.)
No one can escape the prison of time, not even you.. (Rejected the request.)
You armies are getting quite close to see? Do they mean harm?
Thank you, perhaps you stay with me a little longer? (Agreed to request.)
No one can escape the prison of time, not even you.. (Rejected the request.)
I see you are spying on me. Do you like what you see? Are you enjoying yourself?
Thank you, perhaps you stay with me a little longer? (Agreed to request.)
No one can escape the prison of time, not even you.. (Rejected the request.)
I demand you to stop stealing those treasures.
Thank you, perhaps you stay with me a little longer? (Agreed to request.)
No one can escape the prison of time, not even you.. (Rejected the request.)
Time is more important than your faith. Leave me an my citizens alone.
Thank you, perhaps you stay with me a little longer? (Agreed to request.)
No one can escape the prison of time, not even you.. (Rejected the request.)
Let's continue this, I.. I wonder if the galaxy were to seperate us, would we miss each other? (Tokisaki Kurumi wants to continue the alliance.)
I can't wait to enjoy the taste of you ~ (Continuation of the alliance.)
I hope that one day we will meet again. (Rejected the continuation of the alliance)
I want to be one with you ~ (The continuation of the alliance has been permitted.)
I was a capricious child, too. (The continuation of the alliance has been rejected.)
